topic.title: Phcr Relevant Medical Condition History Observation - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Relevant Medical Condition Type DYNAMIC, where its data type is CD

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship, such that
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR (refers to)
